resources.string: The city has already been set as the home city

"To deny these access requests, please untick the checkboxes. Weather forecast function may not work properly if you denied the access requests below. Go to Clock -> World clock to change the settings later."
Set desired behaviour of the side keys when pressed during an alarm
Tapping a weather icon will redirect you to %1$s where you can view the extended forecast for the day.
World clock supports up to %d cities. To add more cities, please delete the existing cities from the list.
